purpose: To streamline the creation and management of AI agents for automating tasks ranging from simple to complex challenges.
principle: Builds on a multi-agent framework using large language models (LLMs) to facilitate agent collaboration and task automation.
reusability: Offers a flexible API for integrating custom agents, supports modular agent design for easy composition and customization.
limitations: Primarily focused on Python environments, may require additional configuration for non-standard use cases.
name: PraisonAI
description: PraisonAI is a production-ready Multi AI Agents framework, designed to create AI Agents to automate and solve problems ranging from simple tasks to complex challenges. It provides a low-code solution to streamline the building and management of multi-agent LLM systems, emphasising simplicity, customisation, and effective human-agent collaboration.
highlight: Low-code framework for building and managing multi-agent AI systems with a focus on human-agent collaboration.
